name: Backyard Brawl
description:
Welcome to Backyard Brawl! A third person laser tag game.

Note: This game is in early access, and not everything is finished. There are still bugs and missing features, and other aspects that are incomplete. Please email the issue with what you did do find it, how many people were on your server, and whether you were hosting it or not, so these bugs can be replicated and patched.

With a variety of weapons and gameplay, Backyard Brawl is the game you should play.Gamemodes
Frenzy
Go up against other players, all with one goal in mind. Eliminate all other opponents until I rein champion. Survive as long as possible, but if you die, you still keep all your eliminations and ammo.



Controls
Move = WASD
Sprint = Shift (cannot sprint while reloading or sprinting)
Reload = R (cannot reload while sprinting)
Pickup = E
Shoot = Left Click (Cannot shoot while sprinting)
Aim = Right Click (Cannot aim while sprinting)
